name: ultra-fast-arbitrage-engine
description: Ultra-fast arbitrage calculation engine with native Rust backend

scripts.build:rust: cd native && cargo build --release && mkdir -p ../native && cp target/release/libmath_engine.so ../native/math_engine.node 2>/dev/null || cp target/release/libmath_engine.dylib ../native/math_engine.node 2>/dev/null || cp target/release/math_engine.dll ../native/math_engine.node 2>/dev/null || true
